title: Bernie Sanders Acknowledges Being A Socialist Might Be A Political Obstacle
text: IOWA CITY , Iowa , Oct 18 (Reuters) - Democratic presidential candidate Bernie Sanders said on Sunday he plans to give a major speech soon to explain his belief in democratic socialism, acknowledging the political label could be a stumbling
